summary: A former high school teacher turned unionist tries to organize workers laboring with inhuman conditions at a late 19th Century textile factory.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Renato Salvatori|Gabriella Giorgelli|Folco Lulli|Bernard Blier|Raffaella Carrà|François Périer|Vittorio Sanipoli|Mario Pisu|Kenneth Kove|Annie Girardot|Edda Ferronao|Anna Di Silvio|Roberto Diamanti|Elvira Tonelli|Giampiero Albertini|Antonio Di Silvio|Franco Ciolli|Bruno Scipioni|Silvio Anselmo|Pippo Starnazza|Sara Simoni|Anna Glori|Enzo Casini|Antonio Casamonica|Gino Manganiello|Giuseppe Marchetti|Fred Borgognoni|Giulio Bosetti|Giuseppe Cadeo|Piero Lulli|Pippo Mosca
title: I compagni
